title: Effect of a solvothermal method using DMF on the dispersibility of rGO, application of rGO as a CDI electrode material, and recovery of sp2-hybridized carbon
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22665-22675
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03387F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Junho Lee, Seonghyeon Ju, Chaehwi Lim, Jihoon Lee, Yeojoon Yoon
To improve the low dispersibility of rGO, solvothermal reduction was applied with N,N-dimethylformamide and the electrochemical performance was measured.
